21:20 <crocket> I tried to make a link to a heading of a page in Wysiwyg editor's link menu?  
21:20 <crocket> I tried to make a link to a heading of a page in Wysiwyg editor's link menu.  
21:20 <crocket> But # is prepended by a \  
21:27 <crocket> hmm  
21:27 <crocket> # is not properly recognized in wygiwys editor's link creation dialog.  
21:31 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
21:39 <mrvanes> has quit  
21:51 <AndreasJonsson> crocket: I don't think the wysiwyg editor support anchors at the moment.  You'll need to switch to wikitext mode and add ||anchor="HSectionTitle"  
21:52 <AndreasJonsson> The link should look like this: [[Link text>>Pagename||anchor="HSectionName"]]
